Html:
Hi,

I want to create a master details in WPF45 page using MVVM light can you please suggest me some article or sample or example which I can referrer.

I want to understand how to notify parent when child records modified. And in-case there are some property in parent which dependent on child how to notify those property change to parent. Is it feasible to notify parent without using messaging?

PFB the sample class hierarchy:

Candidate
- Name
- Address
- Expenses
- IsStipend [This property will be true in-case candidate having Stipend type of expense]
- IsMeal [This property will be true in-case candidate having Meal type of expense]
- IsContingency
- IsTravel
Expense
- Description
- ExpenseType
